data.text:
@EU_Commission Say NO to law against ecig. It's an help to people to quit cigarette. Think health first
#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Single use cartomisers are harmful to the environment, please don't ban refillables!!! Stop #EUecigBAN save #ecigs
@eu_commission l'#ecig n'est pas un produit connexe du tabac! Aucune référence à l'ecig ne doit apparaître dans la directive #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Mobilisons nous ! Tous ensemble pour que vive la ecig telle que nous la connaissons ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Dont push me underground or back on cigarettes - please, I want to vape #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs n'intéressent pas les jeunes, elles n'intéressent pas les nonfumeurs! ELLES SAUVENT LES FUMEURS DU TABAC #EUecigBAN
@eu_commission arrêtez le délire!!! ... les patchs, gommes à mâcher, et cigarettes sont-ils child proof ??? #EUecigban
@EU_Commission how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs”!
@EU_Commission nous voulons garder notre santé ! pas de retour au tabac, stop ecigban @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission attitude - democracy is fine as long as you do what we want. Corrupt, morally bankrupt dictatorship #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs n'intéressent pas les jeunes, elles n'intéressent pas les nonfumeurs! ELLES SAUVENT LES FUMEURS DU TABAC #euecigban
@EU_Commission Une directive est un acte juridique. Tuer deviendrait donc légal en Europe ? #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission ENTENDEZ ces féroces vapoteurs mugir .... @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Mir war Politik relativ egal, bis zum Geschachere um unsere #ecigs und den #EUecigBan #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission the #ecigs saves the life of million people! Don't listen to the lobby! Say no to the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN Wir lassen uns nicht alles verbieten! ecigs sind Genuss, keine Arznei und kein Tabakprodukt @WahnSinner
@EU_Commission STOP #EUecigBAN! The game is over! #ecigs save lives!
@EU_Commission lAUCUN LOBBY ! les vapoteurs se battent pour eux-mêmes ! @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission @eucouncilpress 
#EuEcigban  #ecig Can you say LAWSUIT? Dear commission of Europe: Don't mess with us. We are voters too!
@EU_Commission #ecigs You know there is no sscientific reason to ban them so just take them out of the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission les vapoteurs se souviendront de votre décision @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs: no tobacco, no combustion, no tar, no carcinogens. So no need for an #EUecigBAN via overregulation. #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Yu have NO POWER, and WE will prove it. Murdererswill finally go to jail.  NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission STOP #EUecigBAN freie Dampfer fordern freie #ecigs als Alternative zum ERWIESEN tödlichen Tabakrauch
@EU_Commission 1 vapoteur = 1 électeur ! @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission you have no legal basis to ban #ecigs.
Try it! 
Lawyers queuing up to defend 12 million vapers.
Ditch article18
#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs no one has died from using an e cig.... millions have died from tobacco. DO NOT VOTE TO BAN THEM #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Lives are more important than money do not ban e cigs #EUecigban

@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN
#ecigs sind ein Genussmittel und als solches ausreichend reguliert
@EU_Commission @Florenz Keine arzneimittelähnliche Überregulierung der #ecigs - das ist ein #EUecigBAN durch die Hintertür!
@EU_Commission No more lies! #ecigs save lives! Stop #EUecigBAN! Wake up!
@EU_Commission #ecigs stop the #EUecigban
@EU_Commission if ecigs had been classed as a medicine in Oct, would you still be banning them? Blatant Hypocrisy  #confused ? me too!
@EU_Commission Trilogue Tobacco vous faites de nous des hors la loi ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @EU2013LT Nicotine is no more a medicine than caffeine....Stop the #EUecigBAN”
@EU_Commission #ecigs You must be making a lot of money from the BIG companies to make it worth you banning e cigs#EUecigban
@EU_Commission NON à la suppression des liquides NON à la suppression des réservoirs NON à la suppression des mod #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission I am a VAPER – I have 7,000,000 friends in Europe – and only 1 enemy: #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #drop18 stop the nonsense, allow #ecigs NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Aiduce EU oui la e-cig non a la mort #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Look at Sweden to realize what benefits smokeless nicotine products like #ecigs may bring to us! No #EUecigBan #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission STOP #EUecigBAN Achtet den demokratischen Beschluss des Europaparlaments, unsere gewählten Abgeordneten haben es verstanden
@EU_Commission #ecigs Don't think you will stop us vaping by banning it.... you will just have another black market #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Freie #ecigs für freie Bürger! #NOecigBAN Es reicht! #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission 

With the right research you could actually sensibly REGULATE

With little research you intend to OBLITERATE 

#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission La vape c'est pas tabou l'#EU n'en viendra pas à bout !! Retirez l'ecig de la directive tabac !! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission und Rat treten die Grundrechte der Europäer mit Füßen! Nein zum #EUecigBAN - für #ecigs
@EU_Commission la ECIG c NOUS! le pouvoir c NOUS! le vote c NOUS! L EUROPE C NOUS! RDV 25/5/2014 #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission STOP #EUecigBAN Riskiert nicht den Tod durch Tabakrauchen, man stirbt am Kohlenmonoxid, nicht am Nikotin!
@EU_Commission La lituanie est un produit du tabac, mais pas l'#ecig. Sortez la de la directive. #EUcigBAN

@EU_Commission TPD all a Haze 

Earth Brother on the other hand is ALL Halcyon Haze 

And you think I'm not making sense.

#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Wenn der #EUecigBAN wirklich durchgedrückt wird seid ihr für viele TOTE MENSCHEN mitverantwortlich! Schöne Träume!
@EU_Commission #ecigs You will have to take my PV from my cold dead hand #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Are you aware that you are about to push millions of #vapers into an uncontrollable black market? No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission « ni médicament, ni produit du tabac !!! » #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Europe?  If you ban #ecigs I will consider myself no longer part of Europe & will vote for any party opposed to europe!
@EU_Commission  vapers from europe shows u whats the sens of #EU when will u makes sense and stop the #EUecigBAN ?
@EU_Commission why dont u use science for ur #ecigs regulations but fanatism and #EUecigBAN them ?
@EU_Commission #EU4Citizens who #EUecigBan s our #ecigs eats little children too
@EU_Commission #ecigs We do not want to be governed by the big tobacco and Pharma companies. We get a chance to vote next year#EUecigban
@EU_Commission #Vapers aren't going away - but our votes might. You risk alienating millions if you don't oppose the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Nicotine and water won`t kill us. But the  #EUEcigBan will. Do not force us to smoke again #ecigs
@EU_Commission All arguments FOR the #EUecigBAN have been shown to be fallacious. Only gateway is AWAY from tobacco. Leave #ecigs alone!
@EU_Commission NEIN zum #EUecigBAN , sondern gebt # ecigs die Chance, noch viele Raucher vor dem Tabaktod zu retten
@EU_Commission @borgton @EUombudsman @EUCouncilPress @European_Union  Take corruption out of the #eu NO to #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission The most dangerous preventable hazard to health in Europe is anyone who supports TPD article 18. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you’re making Europe safe for cigarettes. It’s a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.

@EU_Commission Latest #ecig proposals are still a pile of s**t and should be rejected. AMD 170 is the red line.
#EUecigBAN #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission bringing shame on public health, medical communities, government bodies everywhere. #EUecigBAN #EU #ecigs
@EU_Commission .@MarisolTouraine vous avez été élus pour travailler POUR le peuple et non CONTRE le peuple ! #EUecigBAN #BANecigNAME

@EU_Commission
#EU4Citizens Wir haben das Recht, uns an der Politik zu beteiligen, das solltet Ihr achten #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ni médicament, ni produit du tabac, c’est en tant que produit de consommation courante judicieusement réglementé #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission think about the people in the EU, not about the money of Big Tobacco and Bigpharma! We say NO to #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN Kein nachgewiesener Krankheits- oder Todesfall durch #ecigs - keine Regulierung notwendig - schon gar nicht TRL
@EU_Commission Wir #vapers brauchen eure peinliche Kindermädchenpolitik nicht, wir sind erwachsen! No #EUecigBan #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission nous serions 10 millions à avoir testé la ecig #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs are not tobacco, nor medicine No #EUecigBan
@EU_Commission Moi je vapote, je veux que le trilogue capote #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #EUecigBAN #ecigs”!
@EU_Commission   Never before in the field of human rights has so much been denied to so many   by so few #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission #EuecigBan Will be the biggest public health disaster in recent years. Save #ecigs #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission Aux vapes citoyens ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission   wer #ecigs überreguliert unterstützt Tabakrauchen. Wie lebt es sich mit Millionen Tabakopfern auf den Gewissen? #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission @eucouncilpress 
#EuEcigban  #ecig Stop banning of the electronic cigarette!
@eu_commission Participation citoyenne au trilogue : les citoyens de l'#UE disent NON à l'#ecig dans la directive!  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission NON aux lobbies !!!! OUI à la ecig libre !!! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Arrêt du tabac grâce à la vapote après 30 ans d'essais infructueux! N'allez pas tout casser, soyez responsables  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs no one has died from using an e cig.... millions have died from tobacco. DO NOT VOTE TO BAN THEM #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Mobilisons nous ! Tous ensemble pour que vive la ecig telle que nous la connaissons ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Es kann nur eine Entscheidung geben. §18 raus aus der TPD. Kein #EUecigBAN für die #ecigs
@EU_Commission L’industrie du tabac offre un repas à 10 000 euros à un groupe de parlementaires #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN - Ihr wollt einen etablierten Markt leerfegen, um die ecigs der Konzerne zu etablieren?! Aufwachen #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission that Lituanian Presidency ... who takes it serious? BOUGHT OUT by Philip Morris #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission I WILL NOT OBEY! Stop #EUecigBAN! #ecigs save lives!
@EU_Commission 700.000 dead by the causes of tobacco smoke. Give #ecigs the chance to reduce this number! No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Retrait pur et dur de l’article 18 la e-cig n’est pas du tabac ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Are you worried that if you ban ecigs,12 million EU citizens will spend their vape money on a team of top lawyers? #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission If refillable cartridges were a real risk, you would have tons of evidence by now. #ecigs #EUecigBAN #denormalisedEU
@EU_Commission Si vous ne voulez pas accréditer la thèse du "tous pourris", démarquez vous des lobbies.#EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission   Flavours in #ecigs are a #deterrent to foul-tasting #smoking, not a gateway   to it. No to #EUecigBAN
